thread.title: Check out photos from the Carl Edwards, Daniel Suarez press conference
thread.title_full: Check out photos from the Carl Edwards, Daniel Suarez press conference

title: Check out photos from the Carl Edwards, Daniel Suarez press conference
text:
Check out photos from the Carl Edwards, Daniel Suarez press conference Chase Wilhelm Jan 11, 2017 at 12:36p ET 0Shares 
On Wednesday at the Joe Gibbs Racing shop in Huntersville, North Carolina, Carl Edwards announced he would be walking away from full-time Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series racing. 
It was also made official that reigning NASCAR XFINITY Series champion Daniel Suarez will take over the No. 19 Toyota for the 2017 season and beyond. 
Check out photos from the press conference at JGR: FOXSports.com Tom Jensen 
FOXSports.com Tom Jensen 
(L-R) Joe Gibbs, Daniel Suarez, an ARRIS executive and Ed Laukes of Toyota Racing take the stage to announce Suarez will take over the No.19 for the 2017 season. FOXSports.com Tom Jensen 
The brand new No. 19 ARRIS Toyota Camry Suarez will race during the 2017 season. FOX Sports CJ Woliver 
FOX Sports CJ Woliver 
FOX Sports CJ Woliver
